Uses of Class
mychessmate.Piece

  • Uses of Piece in mychessmate

    Methods in mychessmate that return Piece
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Piece
    Piece.clone()
    This method creates and returns a new Piece object that is a copy of the current piece, with the same value, location and movement state.
    Methods in mychessmate with parameters of type Piece
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerBishopMoves(Piece bishop)
    This method generates all possible moves for a bishop piece belonging to the computer player.
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerKingMoves(Piece king)
    Represents the method for computing legal moves for the computer player's king piece.
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerKnightMoves(Piece knight)
    This method generates possible moves for a computer knight piece in the current chess position.
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerPawnMoves(Piece pawn)
    Generates all possible moves for a computer pawn in the current position and adds them to the list of positions.
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerQueenMoves(Piece queen)
    This method calculates the legal moves of a given queen piece for the computer player.
    void
    MoveGenerator.computerRookMoves(Piece rook)
    Generates all valid moves for a given computer rook on the board and adds them to the positions list.
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanBishopMoves(Piece bishop)
    Generates all possible moves for a human bishop.
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanKingMoves(Piece king)
    This method generates all possible moves for a human player's king on the chess board.
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanKnightMoves(Piece knight)
    Generates all possible moves for a human knight piece on the current position of the board
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanPawnMoves(Piece pawn)
    Generates possible moves for a human pawn.
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanQueenMoves(Piece queen)
    Generates all possible legal moves for a human queen piece on the current game board.
    void
    MoveGenerator.humanRookMoves(Piece rook)
    Generates all possible legal moves for a human rook piece
